link.title: Columbia Elementary School | Home of the Forty Niners

meta.name: viewport

body.class: home page-template-default page page-id-15 et_color_scheme_green et_pb_button_helper_class et_fixed_nav et_show_nav et_primary_nav_dropdown_animation_fade et_secondary_nav_dropdown_animation_fade et_header_style_left et_pb_footer_columns3 et_cover_background et_pb_gutter et_pb_gutters3 et_pb_pagebuilder_layout et_no_sidebar et_divi_theme et-db et_minified_js et_minified_css

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_slider et_pb_slider_0 et_hover_enabled et_clickable et_pb_slider_fullwidth_off et_slider_auto et_slider_speed_7000 et_slider_auto_ignore_hover

div.p: Columbia Elementary’s physcial campus will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

p.span: This is the only way we will be able to have our beloved Book Fair this school year. Our In-House BOOK FAIR is the biggest fundraiser for our Library. Scholastic is offering a 14 day “Virtual Online Book Fair” option. All orders will ship to your homes. All purchases support our library. If you have any questions or need help feel free to email me at mrawlinson@cusd49.com

p.em: Registration packets are available in the front office.

div.a: Check out your teachers reading some of our favorite stories!

div.div: If you are in a mental health crisis please call Tuolumne County Behavioral Health Department on their 24 Hour Crisis Phone line (209) 533-7000 or toll free at (800) 630-1130

p.em: Check out these amazing free resources to take advantage of during the school closure.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_0 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: The Columbia Union School District Board Meetings are on the second Tuesday of each month (except July).

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_1 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: The Local Control & Accountability Plan (LCAP) is a critical part of the new Local Control Funding Formula (LCFF).

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_2 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Find the contact information for our administration, teachers, and staff members.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_3 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Find required notices and reports such as the LCAP, SARC, and Integrated Pest Management.

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_has_overlay et_pb_blog_item_0_0 post-2693 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-events category-news

div.p: We have provided updates and answers to frequently asked questions in the document found by clicking the picture above.

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_has_overlay et_pb_blog_item_0_1 post-2443 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-events category-news category-uncategorized

div.p: To help support your students at home enrichment time during this school closure we have compiled a list of amazing free resources for your child to take advantage of during this time. We hope these sources will help add to the family academic enrichment time that...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_has_overlay et_pb_blog_item_0_2 post-2396 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-events category-news category-uncategorized

div.p: During the week of March 16-20, we will provide lunches for students if needed. If your students need lunch, please email abondelie@cusd49.com with the family name, address, and the number of children, under the age of 18 wheather or not they attenend Columbia, who...
